title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even when dataset is not set
OB: An error is shown when attempting to create a new table group without setting the data set. This behavior is not expected as the UI should not perform any validation.
EB: The group dialog should be shown even when the dataset is not set. There should be no error or validation preventing the creation of a new table group.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Add a table report item to the project. 2. Do not set the data set for the table. 3. Try creating a new table group in the report.
